name: Display success message and attestation to Relying Party
scenarioId: ios/A_combined_business_scenario_on_Travel_4/Travel_Present_attestations_in_proximity-hotel_check_in_69/presentAttestations:Display success message and attestation to Relying Party
methodName: Display success message and attestation to Relying Party

testSteps.description: Given the six-digit PIN field is displayed
When the user enters right the PIN
Then a success message is displayed on screen
And the Relying Party views the requested attestation

userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to present the booking reservation attestations from my EUDI Wallet to the requesting Relying Party (i.e. Hotel check-in desk) in a proximity flow
  So that I can prove my booking reservation at the check-in process by the requesting Relying Party

title: Display success message and attestation to Relying Party
